item.title: legally blind
item.description: Have you ever downloaded a file that you didn’t have permission to get? I have, many times in the past. This post, about copyright issues faced by blind people, may spark much debate in our community, but I feel that it must be written. It will cover games, books, films, and software which blind people copy, the justifications for doing so, and the harm that it can cause. Introduction It was said, about 50 years ago, that some 70 percent of blind people are unemployed.
